text:
in the server config: 
   
<VirtualHost _default_:443>     
    ServerName net.euromb.com   
    ... 
    SSLEngine on 
    SSLCertificateFile  /etc/http.d/conf/ssl.crt/server.crt   
    SSLCertificateKeyFile /etc/httpd/conf/ssl.key/server.key   
</VirtualHost>   
   
<VirtualHost *:443>     
    ServerName net.dn.ua   
    DocumentRoot /home/virtual/net.dn.ua/www  
    ....   
    SSLCertificateFile  /home/virtual/net.dn.ua/net.dn.ua.crt   
    SSLCertificateKeyFile /home/virtual/net.dn.ua/net.dn.ua.key   
</VirtualHost>   
   
Virtual host is working propertly, but connection use sertificate, which is 
specified in  main server config, not those whitch in VirtualHost config. 
SSLCertificateFile option in VirtualHost not override main server config.
creator: develop@dicr.org
chip@force-elite.com
text:
This is by design in the SSL/HTTPS protocol.
See:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.1/ssl/ssl_faq.html#vhosts
